column1: Data collection in progress by Jeremy Pressman (@djpressman, U of Connecticut), Erica Chenoweth (@EricaChenoweth, Harvard U), and Ches Thurber (Northern Illinois University ).
With thanks to Francis Greenwood Jr, Aaron Hooker, Miu Kumakura, Jennifer Nilsen, and Aristotle Vainikos for assistance compiling sources.
We are collecting this data in the public interest and to further scholarly research. We are working with countlove.org to collect data on demonstrations.
